version_description:
- New templates
- Minor design changes
- Stability improvements

- New templates
- Minor design changes
- Stability improvements

- New features
- New content
- Stability improvements

- New features
- New content
- Stability improvements

- New Timeline feature. Now you can adjust the timings and duration of texts, stickers and other objects of your stories.
- New templates in the Social category: create stories about Twitter, TikTok, Facebook and new content on Instagram.
- Integration with Unsplash and Pexels. Photos and videos from famous content stocks can now be added to your stories directly from the app.
- New music for your stories. 80+ tracks have been added to our music library.
- We have optimised the size of the app, which will take up less space on your device.
- Some stability upgrading, UX/UI and other technical improvements. Now it's even easier to use the app.

- New Timeline feature. Now you can adjust the timings and duration of texts, stickers and other objects of your stories.

- New music for your stories. 80+ tracks have been added to our music library.
- We have optimised the size of the app, which will take up less space on your device.
- Some stability upgrading, UX/UI and other technical improvements. Now it's even easier to use the app.
